name: Temple of Unstable God
description:
Temple of Unstable God

is a funky 2D action-foraging platformer with neat physics created in two weeks for Godot Wild Jam #49 by texnoforge and friends in Godot Engine 3.5 ❤

Controls ⌨ 🖱

  • move: WSAD or arrow keys
  • throw fruit: left mouse button (hold to continue throwing)
  • wall jump: W or UP when sliding wall (no left/right input)
  • forage: auto when standing still
  • sacrifice: auto when standing on shrine
Features
  • state-of-the-art 🍎🍌🍆🥑 ballistics
    • all 🍎 use physics
    • spawn as much 🍎 as you want / can
    • 🍎-operated buttons and mechanisms
    • drown in 🍎
  • collect 🌽🥬🍐🥥🍄 to calm the Unstable God
    • search the temple for 6 different offerings
    • ponder the mysterious binary 🍎 doom timer
    • get bonked by 🥥
    • deliver offerings to the Fire of Sacrifice
    • fail to satisfy the Unstable One and witness annihilation
  • secrets
    • you need to find those yourself 👀
Credits
  • 🐒 coding: voice of texnoforge
  • 🎨 art: CatGutsNightmare
  • 🎵 music: Dr. Avocadough
  • 🔊 sound: Apheo

..and of course, all the awesome people who contribute to Godot Engine and other FOSS projects ♥

Stats
  • 📜 2400 lines of code
  • 👩‍💻 87 git commits
  • 🤖 39 Godot scenes
  • 🔊 106 sounds
  • 🖼 44 images
